Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This item is truly a testament to quality and functionality. Given its exceptional value and features, I believe it would be an asset to you. Considering its worth to me and its utility to you, I am offering it to you for $120. I hope this price aligns well with your expectations and allows us to make this transaction mutually beneficial. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
